funcs.dialogue: async function dialogue([main, ...others], at) { others.forEach(w => api.window(w, [Math.random(), Math.random()], 32)), await api.window(main, at, 32, 0) }
funcs.initialDialogue: async function initialDialogue() { const at=null;  for (let entry of level.initialDialogue) await dialogue(entry, at) }
funcs.main: async function main() { makeItEasier(), await initialDialogue() }

onLoad: let s='';    for (let k in level.funcs) s += 'const '+k+'=level.funcs.'+k+'='+level.funcs[k]+'\n';    new Function('L', s+'\nreturn main()')(level)
onWon:
(async function() { api.levelSuggest('levels/x2/6.json'), api.levelSuggest('levels/backgrounds/initial.json', {won:1}), api.levelSuggest('levels/backgrounds/1.json', {won:1}); 
 await api.window(`Thanks again.`, null, 32);  await api.window(`Not even the billowing waves of whipping flesh can match your ancient power.`, null, 32);  api.levelLoad('levels/x2/6.json') })()
onLost: api.window([`(LOSER)`, `TODO:`, `(Now time to loop the words.)`][(api._x2_6 = api._x2_6+1||0) % 3], 'pointer1', 32).then(() => api.levelLoad())
